QUESTION: I am light as a feather, but not even the strongest man can hold me for much longer than a minute. What am I? (Breath)
I am not alive, but I grow. I don't have lungs, but I need air. I don't have a mouth, but I need water to live. What am I? (Plant)
I am always in front of you, but can’t be seen. What am I? (Future)
I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a fortress, to be used when required. What am I? (Salt)
I am tall when I am young, and short when I am old. What am I? (Candle)
I am an odd number. Take away a letter, and I become even. What number am I? (Seven)
I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch, will soon turn red. What am I? (Fire)
I am an invention that saves time and space, though I am made of paper, I can hold an unlimited amount of data. What am I? (Book)
I am an essential component of every day, but often neglected and taken for granted. What am I? (Sleep)
I am not alive, but I can die. I don’t have a mouth, but I can be extinguished. What am I? (Fire)
I am a type of bird that can swim, dive, and catch fish with its beak. What am I? (Pelican)
I am a type of animal that can change color to blend in with its surroundings. What am I? (Chameleon)
I am a type of tree that is famous for its ability to survive and grow in inhospitable environments. What am I? (Cactus)
I am a type of insect that can fly and feed on flowers. What am I? (Bee)
I am a type of animal that is known for its long neck and ability to reach high branches for food. What am I? (Giraffe)
I am a type of musical instrument that can be played with a bow. What am I? (Violin)
I am a type of animal that is known for its large size, intelligence, and use of tools. What am I? (Orangutan)
I am a type of plant that produces seeds in a pod. What am I? (Pea)
I am a type of bird that is known for its bright colors and beautiful song. What am I? (Canary)
I am a type of animal that is known for its striped fur and tendency to steal food. What am I? (Zebra)
I am a type of tree that is famous for its ability to survive in the harshest conditions. What am I? (Cedar)
I can catch you, but can’t throw, what am I?
Naturally hairy, often wet. Searching for wood that I can get. What am I ?
Four letters stand to make my name. Should 2 be taken, 4 remains. And should they take away 1 more, my meaning will be as before.
You can swallow me, but I can consume you too. What am I?
We are 16 in total, but can never be a king, what are we?
At half I am only some. When I'm full, people will turn my way. What am I?
If you have it and you show it to other people, I’m gone. What am I?
What spends all the time on the floor but never gets dirty?
What has four fingers and thumb, but it is not living?
What is it that no one wants, but no one wants to lose?
I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?
What loses its head in the morning and gets it back at night?
